title: LF Master/Challenger teams

embed.description: The latest Tweets from Liberty Esports (@LibertyEsport). Looking for players teams for CS:GO, COD, R6 Siege, Rocket league, LOL and many more. DM for interest

body:
Hey guys, I run a newly founded Esports organisation and my goal is to have teams from a range of games compete at a professional level. I am simply just looking for any team that has/can place high at LOL related events/tournaments. Funding for LANs, shirts, etc is a possibility depending on how well your team can perform. I'm open to all offers but would prefer a team with higher ranks. However, if your team can perform well together then that is the exception. So, if you're interested in the offer or want to find out more, simply message my account or visit our twitter page (link above). 
Thanks guys

P.S sorry if the post seems a little rushed or vague. I will be able to explain better and in more detail over discord or what not.
